title: [Champion Concept] - Elyn, The Blade Princess
body:
So I know that a couple people have written idea's for this picture! I don't see why they wouldn't it's awesome :D. The creator (Hans Ekaputra) had a great idea when he created this work of art! So here we go this is my shot @ bringing you what I think would be a great champion in league of legends! 





# **Elyn, The Blade Princess**

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J4n1DcpD7LE/UwpSNF6gV2I/AAAAAAAAW8o/ulUYNj-XTHw/s1600/champions-Concept-5.jpg
 
Elyn is a melee bruiser who excels at dealing large amount of damage in a short time.
 
 * * *

> **Passive - Blade Therapy** 
> 
> Each time Elyn switches stance, she gains 25 attack damage for 3 seconds or the first 3 hits which ever comes first. 
>
>This cannot stack or happen again within 5 seconds.

 * * *

> **Q (First Spell) - Gun Blade** COOLDOWN: 7	 MANA: 45/50/55/60/65 
>**PERSISTENT EFFECT:** Elyn gains 10/12.5/15/17.5/20% attack damage.
>
>**STANCE ACTIVATION:** For the next 4 seconds Elyn's attacks will also shoot a random enemy behind the hit target and apply magic damage and on-hit effects.
>15/30/45/60/75(+ 50% Total AD)

* * *

> **W (Second Spell) - Saw Blade** COOLDOWN: 7	 MANA: 45/50/55/60/65
>**PERSISTENT EFFECT:** Elyn gains 7/14/21/28/35% armor penetration.
>
>**STANCE ACTIVATION:** Elyn swings her Blade, dealing (100% bonus AD) physical damage and slowing all enemies around her by 40% for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

* * *

> **E (Third Spell) - Twin Blades** COOLDOWN: 7	 MANA: 45/50/55/60/65 
>**PERSISTENT EFFECT:** Elyn gains 7/14/21/28/35% attack speed and 15% life steal.
>
>**STANCE ACTIVATION:** Elyn jumps to a target. (Range 400)

* * *

>** R (Ultimate) - Ultimate Blade ** COOLDOWN: 200/140/80	 MANA: 100
>**PASSIVE:** Elyn gains 10/15/20% CDR.
> 
>**ACTIVE:** Elyn combines her weapons creating the Ultimate Blade. While active Elyn gain the persistent effect of all her abilities for 15 seconds and her AA range increases to 200.

* * *

# **Lore**

As the oldest daughter of the noble House Laurent, a family known for its long line of elite duelists, Elyn always fought for greatness. Dueling everyone who dare challenge! Beating all foes who dare cross her path she thought herself the greatest duelist. Finally choosing to challenge her father, she lost in what was a humiliating defeat! When she later found out about her fathers treachery she demanded a rematch only to have her younger sister to earn the honor first. After the fight and her fathers lose, she refused to accept that her sister was the new head of House Laurent. Taking her fathers custom weapons Elyn took to find training from true masters. Training in on Mount Targon with the Rakkor clan. Learning all they were willing to teach her, Elyn now seeks to bring House Laurent and her family's name back to the legacy it once was.
* * *

# **Strengths and Weaknesses**

Elyn has a very weak early game, because of this early ganks to push her out of lane are a must. She is a snowballing monster so try to never 1v1 her without a hard form of CC or huge burst damage! She can easily stay in lane or jungle for as long as she needs. Using and crowd control after she uses E means she has no escape. She is strongly countered by any anti-AD champion. 

* * *

# **Stats**
> HP: 547 (83+/LvL) 1958
> Mana: 258 (30+/LvL) 768
> AD: 57.58 (3.1+/LvL) 114.785
> AS: 0.666 (2.95%/LvL) 1.0 (.999~)
> Health Regen: 6.33 (0.6+/LvL) 14.6
> Mana Regen: 7.144 (0.5+/LvL) 15.644
> Magic res. 32.1 (+1.25/LvL) 53.4
> Armor: 24.125 (3.15+/LvL) 77.675
> Mov. Speed: 335
> Attack Range: 150

2. I think it would be better to change her passive to the % damage amp but have it so it stacks. What I mean is, have it so using an ability increases her damage by 10% and each successive ability use increases this by 5%. So her main combo would be to say, use E 10% increase, three autos, then switch to W, 15% damage increase, three autos, then Q, 20% damage increase, three autos, and then finish off with her ult, 25% damage increase. 

Have it so her full potential is only reached by fighting consistently. I'd also change her Q passive to be lifesteal while removing that from her E. This would also make her Q more obviously for the end of her combo after she's taken damage she needs to lifesteal from.

Her ult needs some work I think. Having all of those passives at once is pretty op, it's just too many free stats. I think a better way would be to have it have the persistent effect of the last stance she used before ulting, remove the CDR passive, and instead have her ult give her some sort of combination of the active effects of her basic abilities. 

So maybe have her ult give her auto attacks altered for the duration where right clicking an enemy will cause Alyn to dash to that target and then spin around with an aoe auto that slows enemies close to her and causes bullets to spray out.

Overall though, she might still have too many free stats without enough draw backs, so I think one of two things might need to be done. One is a bit controversial but also interesting, make it so she doesn't gain AD per level. This would make her have to build damage period to make use of her free stats so she can't just build tanky and get by on just that. 

The other idea is to just make it so she loses stats when she is in a different stance. So maybe have her lose attackspeed and movespeed when she uses her W for instance and maybe range and damage when she uses E and MR and Armor when she uses Q?

Edit: She'll also need to be very mana hungry. Like, EXTREMELY mana hungry, as in, AD Anivia mana hungry.

OK Let's take a look at what we got,

Backstory and Design:
Similar, very similar, ok almost carbon copy, of fiora's backstory, might need to be updated, but the design works very well for this kind of character.
C for the technicals.

Gameplay:
Ok so the base abilities are good, except for one thing, the passive effects are broken beyond belief, seriously look at the amount of attack damage, lifesteal, cdr, and armor penetration she'll have late game, so remove passives, but the abilities and her overall gameplay is good.
B+ for gameplay

so here's my final standings, It's good for it's time but it's in desperate need of refining and updating so overall it's a C+ champion concept their are some pros (good design and fun base gameplay) but the cons (REALLY uninteresting and copy backstory and really op late game) are what keep it down, now before you say how, "oh their early game is supposed to be bad" the problem with that is that when they max out one ability they can completely snowball (see also {{champion:84}} {{champion:29}} and {{champion:22}}). Hope you see this and improve the champion concept later on, ta-ta.

So it's like Fiora/Udyr? Interesting. I absolutely HATE Udyr because playing him feels one-dimensional and boring due to how lame switching his stances feels. This however seems to be making each 'stance' into an ability as well. Which is a far better way to handle it. I do think some of these numbers are a bit too high. Like the passive Armor Pen from her Saw Blade stance. Even Darius' passive E only gives him 25% armor pen. Maybe flat Penetration would be better than % for her? Dunno, 35% just seems pretty high, considering that 35% armor pen is what a Last Whisper gives you. Also, the Gun Blade passive giving you % extra AD seems really powerful, especially if she maxes it first, it makes ALL of her item purchases, runes, and masteries FAR more effective. Maybe instead of AD, give her a range increas in auto-attacks? Like Jayce switching to Hammer Form. She IS using a GUNblade after all, so when she's in that form give her increased Auto Attack range as a passive? Just a thought. Her AA range does increase in her ult form after all, so maybe just move that extra AA range from her ult, to her Gunblade passive. You might also be able to then put the 20% extra AD into her ult instead, make it into a temporary high-damage form where she does tons of extra damage with her Ultimate Blade?

As for her lore, getting to Mount Targon seems pretty hard. Maybe instead of just waltzing up there, she got heavily wounded in a battle, but the Rakkor clan saw her talent, and took her there to heal her, and train her? Might also be a good explanation of where she got her blades, since the House Laurent doesn't seem the most technical of families. Maybe the people on Mount Targon had them in their armory and she chose them as her weapons? Once again, just spitting out ideas. I like the concept though, and that art is awesome.

If the Gunblade is based of the Blades from FF8, then it would be more of a Defense breaker rather then range. I was bored at one point an looked up how Squall's blade work. At the point of contact, The trigger would be pulled increasing damage and some times breaking Defenses.
So It could be used as her Pursuit, Charge and Flee move that has piercing damage of 2%, 2.5%, 3%, 3.5%, then 4% for basic with a 5%-7% Piercing for active skill.
But Due to the recoil from each shot, her attack speed would go down by .20 - .30 at level five

The Twin Blades I would Suggest lowering her Damage by Half and dropping Life steal in favor of auto block and three hits or damage. Attack speed and be raised by up to .35 at level five after starting out with .20 For level one
The jumping stays as a Hi how you doing move

The Saw-blade's original set up I think works best by having it be an Arc based weapon which sacrifices speed and Defense but acts as a splash with higher damage. This would drop her Piercing damage but make her a decent minion farmer and Group fighter with another person near by. Making this most likely her starting move of choice.
Due to momentum being a thing though with arc based attacks, If She stays in a single place constantly attacking, her attack speed can increase with each attack with up to 10 Stacks of +0.05 AS, but as soon as she moves or stops attacking the attack speed is lost.
The active for the move though would possibly be a single forward spin for 50 - 250 Piercing.
Using the active will cause her to step forward with out losing her stacks.

Due to the Sheree weight of all the ultimate weapon, I would advise it be temporary for maybe 10 seconds with the ability to deactivate it sooner by pressing Q/W/E; Which when hit has a temporary double buff for the active skills only with an added cool down of 10 seconds to the other two as her swords would be 'left' on the ground. Like Gnar's boomerang, picking them up would drop the additional five seconds This Ignores the (Second) Main passive as her swords are not on her.
The Passive would be The Gun-blades Piercing and speed with The Saw-blades arc and Damage with every 3 hits auto block activating

For her Main Passive I would giver her something that lowers the cool down of her current stance by 2 (At 1) - 4 (18) seconds 
Or
 Granting her the ability to 'sheath' her swords once every five seconds out side of combat by pressing the Key of the equipped sword cutting her cool downs to 0. Ultima Excluded
To compensate for that though, her cool downs would have to be ten seconds minimal even when they are maxed out.
